languages.text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot move. Until the end of combat, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −3.
languages.original_text: До следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} цель не может двигаться. Запас ее {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} уменьшается на 3 до конца боя.

traits.locale_text:
- Until the Adept's next turn, the target cannot move.
- Until the end of combat, the target's MP are reduced by -3.
Until the Adept's next turn, the target cannot move, and the target's MP are reduced by −3.

Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot move. Until the end of combat, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −3.

Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot move. Until the end of combat, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −3.

languages.text: До следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} цель не может двигаться. Запас ее {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} уменьшается на 3 до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot move. Until the end of combat, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: До следующего хода адепта цель не может двигаться, а количество ее ОП уменьшается на 3.
До следующего хода адепта цель не может двигаться, а количество ее ОП уменьшается на 3.

languages.text: 目标无法移动，且目标的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}减少3点，效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot move. Until the end of combat, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: 目标无法移动，且目标的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}减少3点，效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。

languages.text: Hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g}, el objetivo no puede moverse y sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} se reducen en −3 hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot move. Until the end of combat, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del agente, el objetivo no puede moverse y sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} se reducen en −3.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}までターゲットは移動不可となり、戦闘終了までターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が-3減少する。
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot move. Until the end of combat, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: アデプトの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}までターゲットは移動不可となり、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が-3減少する。

languages.text: Das Ziel kann sich bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agenten{/g} nicht bewegen. Bis zum Ende des Kampfes reduzieren sich die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Ziels um −3.
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot move. Until the end of combat, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel kann sich bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Agenten nicht bewegen. Außerdem reduzieren sich die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Ziels um −3.

languages.text: Jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g}, la cible est incapable de se déplacer et ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} sont réduits de −3.
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot move. Until the end of combat, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'Adepte, la cible est incapable de se déplacer et ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} sont réduits de -3.

languages.text: Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan'ın{/g} bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} dek hareket edemez. Hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} değeri 3 puan azalır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot move. Until the end of combat, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −3.
